title: White House Report  Says Climate Change Is Here And Now
teaser: A new U.S. government report tells an unambiguous story: The planet is warming, climate change is driven primarily by people and it's already affecting Americans, through more frequent or intense heat waves, downpours and, in some regions, floods or droughts.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
